Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your phone each time you power it on

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your phone, you must enter a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on: you can't unencrypt your phone except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data."
Charge your battery and try again.
Plug in your charger and try again.
No lock screen PIN or password
You must set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.
Encrypt phone? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the phone will restart several times.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.

"Encryption was interrupted and can't complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible.
To resume using your phone, you must perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account."
Change or disable pattern, PIN, or password security

"When Face Unlock can't see you, how do you want to unlock?"
Disabled by administrator, encryption policy, or credential storage

Password must contain at least one symbol

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, People contacts, and more.
Just bring the devices together (typically back to back) and then touch your screen. The app determines what gets beamed."

Your phone and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your phone or loss of data that may result from using these apps.

If you disable a built-in app, other apps may misbehave.
If you disable a built-in app, you cannot see this app in the phone and unexpected error may be occurred in other apps.
Disabling this application will make it invisible from this device and unexpected errors may occur while using other applications. Continue?
View and control currently running services
This service was started by its app. Stopping it may cause the app to fail.
"This app can't safely be stopped. If you stop it, you may lose some of your current work."
"This is an old app process that is still running in case it's needed again. There is usually no reason to stop it."
%1$s: currently in use. Touch Settings to control it.
If you stop this service, some features of your phone may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.

USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. Use it to copy data between your computer and your device, install apps on your device without notification, and read log data.

"When Explore by Touch is turned on, you can hear or see descriptions of what's under your finger.
This feature is for low-vision users."
%1$s can collect all of the text you type, except passwords. This includes personal data such as credit card numbers. It can also collect data about your interactions with the phone.

Removing this account will delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from the phone!

"Measured by your phone. Your carrier's data usage accounting may differ."
Disable background data on mobile data network only. Wi-Fi will be used if available.
To restrict background data for this app, first set a mobile data limit.

"This feature may cause an app that depends on background data to stop working when Wi-Fi isn't available.
You can find more appropriate data usage controls in the settings available within the app."
"Restricting background data is possible only when you've set a mobile data limit."

"Your %1$s data connection will be disabled when the specified limit is reached.
Since data usage is measured by your phone, and your carrier may account for usage differently, consider using a conservative limit."
"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to a Wi-Fi network."
Permanently remove the user CA certificate?

After you turn on Explore by Touch, you can touch the screen to learn what’s under your finger. For example, the current screen contains app icons. Find one of them by touching the screen and sliding your finger around.
Good. Keep sliding your finger around the screen until you find at least one more icon.
To activate something that you’re touching, tap it. Slide your finger until you find the icon for the %s. Then tap the icon once to activate it.
Your finger is touching the %s icon. Tap once to activate the icon.
Your finger moved over the %s icon, and then moved away. Slowly slide your finger around the screen until you find the Browser icon again.
Good. To move to the next lesson, find and activate the %s button, located near the bottom-right corner of the screen.

To scroll through a list, you can slide two fingers along the screen. For example, the current screen contains a list of app names that can scroll up or down. First, try to identify a few items in the list by sliding one finger around.
Good. Keep sliding your finger around to find at least one more item.
Now place two fingers on an item in the list and slide both fingers up. If you reach the top of the screen, lift your fingers, place them lower on the list, and continue sliding up.
Good. Keep sliding your fingers up to scroll some more.
You have completed the tutorial. To exit, find and touch the %s button.

Using assistant GPS data improves location searching speed. It may incur 3G/4G data charges.
Use Location Services Provided by Verizon Wireless
Use Location Services based on Standalone GPS

By selecting \"Standalone GPS Services\", you are allowing access to all location information by any third party through web access or any software or peripheral components you chose to install, download, add/or attach to the device or any other means. Enabling this functionality could pose certain risks to users of this device.

By selecting VZW Location Services, you are enabling Verizon Wireless and third party authenticated and validated location services to access certain location information available through this device and/or the network.

Apply the options while screen is turned on.
Ask USB connection mode when connecting to a computer
You can charge your phone via USB without any connection
You can synchronise your phone with Windows media player to facilitate the transfer and management of media files
● MTP works with Windows Vista and Window 7
● MTP also works with Windows XP if Windows media player 10 or latest versions are installed
● On Mac or other OSs, you can transfer files between computer and your phone by installing MTP software to your computer
"You can tether your phone to your computer with a USB cable, to share your phone's Internet connection with your computer"
● Tethering works with Windows Vista, Windows 7 and Linux
"● You can't mount your phone's SD card on your computer when USB is tethered."
● For more information, including using USB tethering with other OSs see http://www.android.com/tether#usb
You can use helpful LG software installed in your computer by connecting via USB
● LG PC suite, OSP(On Screen Phone), LG Mobile support tool, etc.

You can connect your phone as camera to facilitate the transfer and management of photos or videos (When MTP is not supported, you can transfer files between computer and your phone with PTP connection)
● PTP works with Windows Vista, Windows 7 and Mac
● On Linux or other OSs, you can use PTP connection by installing PTP software to your computer
Transfer files or synchronise with Windows media player
Connect to PC software for LG mobile
Connect as camera and transfer photos (Transfer files when MTP is not supported)
Ask USB connection type when connection to PC
Enable phone and LG PC Suite to be connected via Wi-Fi
Mass storage mode enables you to transfer files between a storage in your phone and your computer when you connect your device to your computer via USB
You can use your phone as modem for Dial-up network
You can charge your phone via USB without any data interaction
USB storage mode enables you to transfer files between a storage in your phone and your computer when you connect your device to your computer via USB
To enable tethering on this device, go to att.com/mywireless or dial 611.
Tethering allows your Android-powered device to be used as a modem to access the internet on your laptop while on the go.

This feature consumes battery power and increase your data usage. This service requires a subscription to the applicable modem plan. Please ensure you have subscribed to the appropriate data plan prior to use. Dial 611 if you need assistance.
Use of service constitutes acceptance of the %1$s.

"To use On-Screen Phone, 'On-Screen Phone' program has to be installed in PC first. And you can control phone remotely with using phone screen displayed in PC via USB, Bluetooth or Wi-Fi connection."
Displaying screen and controlling phone from PC are available through USB, Bluetooth or Wi-Fi connection.
On-Screen Phone is activated. Disconnect On-Screen Phone?

"In order to use On-Screen Phone, you must first installed the ‘On-Screen Phone’ software onto your PC. On-Screen Phone allows you to remotely control your mobile device through your PC via USB, Bluetooth, or Wi-Fi connection."

Data network connection is allowed. When data network is connected, additional charges will be incurred.
Data Network connection disallowed. But MMS will be function as normal, and with access to Wi-Fi you can use automatic sync and data through Calendar, email and other services.
Always ask for permission to use data network at power on.
Data network setting is temporarily not available. Retry please.
Connecting to WCDMA/LTE data network. You may incur additional charges if you are not using a flat rate pricing plan. Do you want to make the connection?
Connecting to 3G/4G data network. You may incur additional charges if you are not using a flat rate pricing plan. Do you want to make the connection?
3G/4G data connection is allowed. You may incur additional charges if you are not using a flat rate pricing plan.
3G/4G data connection is blocked. You can change your settings for 3G/4G data connection in the Data Network Settings.
International roaming charge will be applied while using roaming service(messaging and voice) from abroad.

"Data service can be used overseas if Data Roaming is enabled. however, using Data Roaming overseas can result in heavy extra fees being incurred.
Enable data roaming?"

"Data service can be used overseas if Data Roaming is enabled. however, using Data Roaming overseas can result in heavy extra fees being incurred.
Enable data roaming?"

"Data roaming can be used. Please be advised that using Data Roaming overseas can result in heavy extra fees being incurred.
Enable data roaming?"
Data roaming can be used. please be advised that using Data Roaming overseas can result in heavy extra fees being incurred.
Data roaming is blocked. You can change your settings for Data roaming in the Global roaming settings.
Always ask for permission to use mobile network. Wi-Fi is disabled now, mobile network charges may apply.

"Data roaming service has been basically blocked for overseas roaming since automatic update function for application, email and other services incur additional data roaming charges.

Press 'Allow' when you want data roaming.

Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your storage each time you mount it on

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your device, you must enter a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on: you can't unencrypt your device except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your device plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data."
Encrypt device? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the phone will restart several times.

Your device and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your device or loss of data that may result from using these apps.
You must change screen lock before you use credential storage

"If you turn location \"ON\" and activate a third party location based service on this handset, you consent to U.S. Cellular's use of and disclosure to such third party of this handset's location. Turning location \"ON\" will allow U.S. Cellular to track the location of this handset and share such information with third party providers of location-based services. Once this handset's location information is transferred from U.S. Cellular to the third-party location-based service provider, that third party's privacy policy will govern subsequent uses of your location information. You should carefully review the terms and conditions and associated privacy policy of each such location- based service for information regarding how the third party provider of that service will use, disclose, protect and retain your location information. Such uses may include, but not be limited to, offering you location-based promotions and sharing your location with others."

"U.S. Cellular uses a variety of commercially reasonable and appropriate safeguards to protect location information residing on our systems from unauthorized access or disclosure including, without limitation, server firewalls and physical facility security. We also restrict access to location information to only those work groups that need to know that information for their job function. No security is perfect, however, and U.S. Cellular cannot guarantee the security of your location information. U.S. Cellular does not guaranty the accuracy or completeness of location information delivered through its network, and any location-based service may be disrupted or fail due to environmental factors and factors affecting satellite usage. You should understand the risks involved in consenting to the disclosure of your handset's location information before requesting a location based service and inform users to whom you provide your handset that his or her location can be tracked."

"Turning location \"OFF\" will hide the location of this handset from everyone except U.S. Cellular, the entities to which U.S. Cellular may disclose your location information as permitted by law, including but not limited to public safety, fire service or law enforcement officials in emergency situations, and third party providers of location-based services that track the location of this handset without U.S. Cellular's cooperation."

string.name: sp_usc_gps_popup_fourth_NORMAL
string.b: You consent to disclosure of the location of this handset from U.S. Cellular to third-party providers of location-based services by turning location \"ON\".

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. You can disable encryption by performing disabling storage encryption.
Only data created on storage after enabling storage encryption will be encrypted. Encrypted data can not be read in other devices. By disabling storage will not be encrypted.
If you interrupt the process, you will lose some or all of your data."
For encryption, you must set PIN or password for lock screen. Do you want to continue?
Enabling encryption internal storage? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data.
Enabling encryption SD card? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data.
Disabling encryption internal storage? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data.
Disabling encryption SD card? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data.
Data on SD card will be encrypted. You can stop encryption if you do not want.
Current PIN is applied to SD card encryption. PIN needs to disable SD card encryption.
SD card has protected data. Encryption is enabled. To read protected data on SD card, you must enter PIN that was used when enabling SD card encryption.
Fails to read data on SD card. It is not allowed to access to data encrypted. Current PIN is required every time SD card is mounted.
Current password is applied to SD card encryption. Password needs to disable SD card encryption.
Fails to read data on SD card. It is not allowed to access to data encrypted. Current password is required every time SD card is mounted.
SD card has protected data. Encryption is enabled. To read protected data on SD card, you must enter password that was used when enabling SD card encryption.
Do you want to create new PIN or password? If you do not create new one, current PIN is required every time SD card is mounted.
To use data encrypted with different type of encryption on SD card, Sync encryption type is required. Enable encryption will be activated with Sync encryption type.
Sync encryption SD card? Encryption takes 10 minutes or more. You must start with a charged battery. This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data.
Some data on SD card has encrypted with different type of encryption. Such data can not be accessed unless Sync encryption type is done.

When Eco mode is turned off, Automatic mode is used to control the Quad cores to provide optimized system performance."

Would you like to activate Power saver?
Turn off Wi-Fi. Turning off Wi-Fi can extend battery life. However, if you surf the Web frequently, using Wi-Fi can save more battery than using the cellular network.
Turn off Bluetooth. Not using Bluetooth headset can extend battery life.
Applications using GPS location data reduce battery life. Turning off GPS can extend battery life.
Applications such as Gmail, Calendar and Facebook are auto synced via wireless network at specific intervals. Syncing data manually can extend battery life.
Turn off NFC. Not using NFC can extend battery.
Lowering the brightness of the screen can extend battery life.
Select features to turn off when battery is low
Turn off Wi-Fi if data is not in use
Turn off Bluetooth if not connected
View which components and application use the most battery
Adjust Front key light time out
Start saving battery by turning off your selected features.
Auto-sync, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Vibrate on touch, Brightness, Screen timeout, Front key light

Applications such as E-mail, Calendar, Contacts and Facebook(listed under Settings - Accounts & sync) are auto-synched using the mobile or Wi-Fi network. Turning off Auto-sync can extend battery life.
Extend battery life by turning off Wi-Fi when battery is low. If you must use data when battery is low, use Wi-Fi instead of mobile network since Wi-Fi consumes less power than mobile network data.
Turning off Bluetooth can extend battery life.
No vibration on touch can extend battery life.
Making Screen timeout short can extend battery life.
Making front key light short can extend battery life.
Current screen brightness is the preview when power saver turns on.
will turn on below %1$s battery level

string.name: wifi_p2p_help_desc_02
string.li: This device can create a group connection or direct connection with other Wi-Fi devices.

string.name: wifi_p2p_help_desc_03
string.li: Wi-Fi Direct allows quick and easy connection with other devices.

string.name: wifi_p2p_help_desc_04
string.li: To share data after connecting, use SmartShare application on the device.

string.name: wifi_p2p_help_desc_05
string.li: Wi-Fi Direct may use more battery. You may want to plug the phone into a power outlet.
